hasDitaContent.@value: Triamcinolone is predicted to decrease the concentration of aspirin (high-dose) and aspirin (high-dose) increases the risk of gastrointestinal bleeding when given with triamcinolone. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Triamcinolone   is predicted to   decrease   the concentration of   aspirin   (high-dose)  and  aspirin   (high-dose)   increases   the risk of gastrointestinal bleeding when given with   triamcinolone .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Aspirin (high-dose) increases the risk of acute renal failure when given with xipamide. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasDitaContent.@value: Zidovudine increases the risk of haematological toxicity when given with aspirin (high-dose). Manufacturer makes no recommendation.
